summary:
These are required mods:
High Quality Eyes
ECE
UNP
Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for UNP
KSHairdo
True Brows
descriptionHtml:
[img width=596,height=218]http://i.imgur.com/bWVe0mc.jpg[/img]
[size=3][i]
[/i][/size][center][size=3][i]This is one of my personal character over the years I played Skyrim. Since there were requests for my character's preset I decided to upload it here. Her appearance had experienced changes thanks to Skyrim crashes and reinstalls (lol).[/i][/size]


[font=Tahoma][color=#b6d7a8][u][b][size=5]REQUIREMENTS[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]

In order to get the preset to look similar* to pics I'd uploaded here are the required mods:
High Quality Eyes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/498/?]LINK[/url]
ECE [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]LINK[/url]
UNP [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]LINK[/url]
Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for UNP [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]LINK[/url]
KSHairdo [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]LINK[/url]
True Brows [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?]LINK[/url]

[i]*However the preset won't be perfectly similar since I have spliced/mixed up textures for female character (I'm very sorry).[/i]


[font=Tahoma][color=#dbb0a7][u][b][size=5]INSTALLATION[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]

[size=3][i][color=#6d9eeb]For ECE users:[/color][/i]
[size=3]1. Download the "ECE preset"
2. Extract the file and copy it to myDocuments/My Games/Skyrim/CME_save
3. In game, load your preset in ECE.
- Slot [/size][/size][size=3]5 for this preset

[color=#6d9eeb][i]For RACEMENU users:[/i][/color]
Will do it for future! :)[/size]


[font=Tahoma][color=#b4a7d6][u][b][size=5]RECOMMENDED MODS[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Face Animation
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]TK Facelight


[color=#ff7700][font=Tahoma][u][b][size=5]CREDITS[/size][/b][/u][/font][/color]
[/url]
I would like thanks to all modders that had created wonderful cosmetic mods in Skyrim. I also would like thanks for all people who had endorsed my character's images.

For any questions and recommendations, fire it up. I appreciate any recommendations to improve this preset.

I am also delighted if anyone would convert this mod to a follower (with specific scripts). Contact me if you are interested.[/center]
author: saldin93
